Name: Steel Nations
About the game: Steel Nations Steel Nations is a real-time grand strategy game that allows you to become the leader of the World. The game combines management stages of economics, commerce, wargames, construction, diplomacy, simulation, and political influence. Lead any country in the world to global domination in various game scenarios. Play Futuristic Scenerios. 243 real countries all playable & equipped with realistic data from WorldBank, Globalfirepower. Use Diplomacy, Trade, military force, and Intimidation to influence the policies of other nations. Buy minerals, order weapons and improve your army. Make use of common political instruments in your international relations, including spy tactics and espionage to directly influence other nationsâ€™ internal affairs. Modernize your economy to support your social and military policies. Embargo treaties result in a drop in relations. International organizations (over 7 organizations included) play an important role. Secret services play an important role.Dismantle terrorist networks, sabotage foreign infrastructure, assassinate an opponent, send reconnaissance drones or position satellites to locate enemy units, etc. Grow and develop your nation to the highest possible levels of economic power, technological competitiveness and military supremacy in globally-ranked charts. Sophisticated Real-Time Strategic and Tactical Control of your Military Forces.
